__e: I wasn't cheating on you, if that's what you're getting at.
Had a husband and a kid, and he cheated on me with some crazy woman.
I'm sorry he cheated on me with you, and I'm sorry that I pretended to ignore it for as long as I did.
And now one of you has betrayed her and stolen something from her... a key.
If you hadn't cheated on me... And lied to me all these years. None of this would have ever happened.
You asked me if he was having an affair, and I said that he wasn't.
So you're saying the problem isn't that you cheated, it's that you got caught.
Thank you. I know you believe I cheated on you, But I never did.
Yeah, I know she betrayed you, but she's your sister and she's the only one you've got.
